item.title:
Benedict Cumberbatch to play Pete Seeger opposite Timothée Chalamet’s Bob Dylan in ‘A COMPLETE UNKNOWN’.
Seeger was a major influence on Dylan, paving the way for his infatuation of the American folk music scene.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Benedict Cumberbatch joins the Bob Dylan biopic ‘A COMPLETE UNKNOWN’ starring Timothée Chalamet.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Auliʻi Cravalho reveals she will not reprise her role of Moana in the live action movie: “I will not be reprising the role. I believe it is absolutely vital [that] the cast accurately represents the characters and stories we want to tell.”
She will remain as executive producer.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Jacob Elordi stars in two films potentially premiering at the 2023 Venice Film Festival:
• SALTBURN (dir: Emerald Fennell) - with Barry Keoghan, Rosamund Pike, Carey Mulligan, Allison Oliver, Archie Madekwe & Ewan Mitchell
• PRISCILLA (dir: Sofia Coppola) - with Cailee Spaeny
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Emerald Fennell’s SALTBURN may premiere at the Venice Film Festival.
Described as similar to ‘The Talented Mr. Ripley,’ it follows a young man (Keoghan) who develops an obsession with his classmate (Elordi).
Starring Barry Keoghan, Jacob Elordi, Rosamund Pike & Carey Mulligan.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: ‘INDIANA JONES AND THE DIAL OF DESTINY’ debuts with a Rotten Tomatoes score of 33% from 12 reviews so far.
item.author: FilmUpdates
